content: कुसी(सि)द {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Lazy, slothful. --दः (also written as कुशी-षी-द) A money-lender, usurer. --दं {@--1@} Any loan or thing lent to be repaid with interest. {@--2@} Lending money, usury, the profession of usury; कुसीदाद् दारिद्र्यं परकरगतग्रंथिशमनात् <ls>Pt. 1. 11</ls>; <ls>Ms. 1. 90</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">8. 410</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 119.</ls>
